example.name: basic case
example.text: Economists say a buildup in inventories can provoke cutbacks in production that can lead to a recession.
example.arg: cutbacks in production that can lead to a recession

example.name: misparsed object

example.name: with separate reactor
example.text: To say that the Pentagon should act irresponsibly because acting responsibly will provoke Congress into acting irresponsibly leads to the conclusion that the Pentagon should deliberately exaggerate its needs in the national interest; in other words, that it is justified in committing a crime -- lying to Congress -- because it is morally superior.
